name: Hentai Survivors
description:
Hentai Survivors is a casual adult Roguelike game

Hentai Survivors is based on a high fantasy roguelike narrative. You need to choose one of five attractive anime female protagonists, and fight with vampires in a night forest map. Lots of monsters are waiting for you, but are you ready to win them all? You can use different skills and magic weapons that each hentai girl has to fight with vampires.
When you beat all creatures and pass the level, you get amazing adult art with one of the hentai girls.
Also, collect treasures with coins during the level to earn more points!




Features
  • Roguelike-style game
  • Amazing and easy mechanics
  • 5 attractive female protagonists
  • Beautiful adult-only scenes


ALL CHARACTERS ARE OVER THE AGE OF 18
